title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; stream chats or pull models from npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM provider for chains, agents, and RAG.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; stream or block on chat, pull, and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL to chat, pull, and manage local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s chat sidebar.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop GUI for Ollama with markdown rendering and model switching.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples for easy server deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot that streams Ollama replies into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing a typed JS/TS client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package; install with pip to chat, embed, or manage models from Python.

title: ollama reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, tips, and integrations around the Ollama ecosystem.
